title: Add MSc Systems Engineering to Education section

requirements.summary: Add MSc in Systems Engineering entry to the Education component as the first item in the education list
acceptanceCriteria: The MSc entry appears as the first item in the education section
The degree displays as 'MSc in Systems Engineering'
The institution displays as 'University of Lagos, Akoka'
The status '(In View)' is clearly indicated
The entry follows the same card layout and styling as existing education entries
The graduation cap icon is displayed consistently with other entries

file_operations.description: Add a new education entry for MSc in Systems Engineering from University of Lagos, Akoka (2026, In View) at the top of the education list. Insert the new entry before the existing B.Eng entry while maintaining the same card structure, graduation cap icon, and styling. Include the '(In View)' status alongside the year in a way that's visually consistent with the existing layout.
